com.samczsun.skype4j.user

Interface Contact


  • public interface Contact
    Represents a contact

    • Method Detail

      • getUsername

        String getUsername()
        Get the username of this contact
        Returns:
        The username

      • getDisplayName

        String getDisplayName()
        Get the displayname of this contact. Can return null if not found
        Returns:
        The displayname

      • getFirstName

        String getFirstName()
        Get the first name of this contact. Can return null if not found
        Returns:
        The first name

      • getLastName

        String getLastName()
        Get the last name of this contact. Can return null if not found
        Returns:
        The last name

      • getAvatarPicture

        BufferedImage getAvatarPicture()
                        throws ConnectionException
        Get the avatar as a BufferedImage. Can return null if not found. Once the image is loaded it is cached so if the first call suceeds it is implied no more exceptions will be thrown
        Returns:
        A clone of the original BufferedImage
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while fetching the original image

      • getAvatarURL

        String getAvatarURL()
        Get the avatar as a URL. Can return null if not found.
        Returns:
        The URL to the avatar

      • getMood

        String getMood()
        Get the mood of this contact. Can return null if not found
        Returns:
        The mood

      • getRichMood

        String getRichMood()
        Get the mood as richtext of this contact. Can return null if not found
        Returns:
        The mood as richtext

      • getCountry

        String getCountry()
        Get the country this contact lives in. Can return null if not found
        Returns:
        The country

      • getCity

        String getCity()
        Get the city this contact lives in. Can return null if not found
        Returns:
        The city

      • isAuthorized

        boolean isAuthorized()
        Get whether this contact is authorized by you to be a contact
        Returns:
        Whether the contact is authorized

      • authorize

        void authorize()
        throws ConnectionException
        Authorize this contact
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint

      • unauthorize

        void unauthorize()
          throws ConnectionException
        Unauthorize this contact
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint

      • sendRequest

        void sendRequest(String message)
          throws ConnectionException,
                 NoSuchContactException
        Send a authorization request to this user
        Parameters:
        message - The message to attach
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while sending the request
        NoSuchContactException - If the user does not exist

      • isBlocked

        boolean isBlocked()
        Get whether this contact is blocked
        Returns:
        Whether the contact is blocked

      • block

        void block(boolean reportAbuse)
    throws ConnectionException
        Block this contact
        Parameters:
        reportAbuse - Whether to report abuse
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint

      • unblock

        void unblock()
      throws ConnectionException
        Unblock this contact
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint

      • isPhone

        boolean isPhone()
        Get whether this contact is a phone number
        Returns:
        Whether this contact is a phone number

      • getPrivateConversation

        Chat getPrivateConversation()
                     throws ConnectionException,
                            ChatNotFoundException
        Get the private conversation between you and this user
        Returns:
        The private conversation
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint
        ChatNotFoundException - If the contact does not exist or is a phone
